DOC.brief_summary: To investigate impact impaired renal function pharmacokinetics ART-123 patient Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation . To investigate safety ART-123 patient Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Pharmacokinetics Study ART-123 Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation ( DIC ) Subjects With Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Japanese Association Acute Medicinedefined DIC criterion score > = 4 Written informed consent patient guardian Patients show intracranial , pulmonary , gastrointestinal hemorrhage Patients history cerebrovascular disorder within past 52 week Patients history hypersensitivity ingredient ART123 preparation Pregnant woman , nurse mother possibly pregnant woman
